Original:
自己來台北旅行想要小酌一下隨意走進一間酒吧，翻開價格，在台北來說價格有夠划算，喝了三杯也沒有喝到讓你滿頭問號的奇怪感覺，而且還能跟著口味進行稍微的客製化，最感到驚喜的是一杯杯緣點綴了跳跳糖的調酒（業餘人士我也不知道在喝什麼只喝得出來有龍舌蘭蔓越莓汁）讓不敢喝酸的我第一次覺得蔓越莓味道是好的，跳跳糖有效的讓酸度下降還很有趣。一個人到這裡，店員的親切程度彷彿讓你在這整座陌生城市也有朋友的感覺，而不是自己一個人在不熟悉的地方喝著悶酒耍孤獨。

不小心當成了ig 在碎碎念，總之特地上來評論是來感謝一位叫做咪姐？的店員（偷聽店員聊天聽得的），健談程度讓我彷彿不是自己一個來的，有趣了不少。

喔對了酒吧有飛鏢都推爆，尷尬時最好用。
EN:
When you travel to Taipei, you want to walk into a bar and open the price at will. In Taipei, the price is cost -effective. After drinking three cups, I didn’t drink it to make you full of question marks. The taste is slightly customized, and the most surprising thing is that a cup of bartending dotted with jumping sugar (I don’t know what to drink, only drinking the liliandri berry juice) to make it dare not dare For the first time, I felt that the cranberry flavor was good, and it was interesting to make the acidity decrease effectively.Here, the cordiality of the clerk seems to make you feel like friends in this strange city, instead of drinking sullen wine and loneliness in unfamiliar places.

I accidentally regarded IG as a broken thought.The clerk (listening to the clerk to chat), the degree of talk made me seem to be the one by myself, it was a lot interesting.

Oh, there are darts blew up, it is best to use when embarrassing.

Original:
我喜歡這家酒吧，他們有完美的無煙環境，非常環保和舒適。無煙環境非常重要，因為它可以讓所有的客戶都感到舒適，而不會被煙霧所困擾。
氛圍非常棒，非常適合和朋友一起來放鬆和享受時光。這個酒吧有一種非常放鬆和溫馨的氛圍。音樂很棒，飛鏢靶也很有趣。
我非常喜歡他們的飛鏢靶，因為它為這家酒吧增加了一份活力和樂趣。飛鏢可以讓客人之間的互動更加順暢，也可以增加一些競爭元素。店員服務很好，非常友好和熱情。無論是在選擇酒類還是食物上，他們都能給予非常客觀的建議和意見。而且在服務方面非常迅速和有效率，這讓我非常驚訝。
總體來說，這家酒吧是我最喜愛的酒吧之一，完美的無煙環境、舒適的氛圍、有趣的飛鏢靶和出色的服務都讓人感到十分滿意。我強烈推薦這家酒吧，尤其是對於喜歡享受高品質時光的人來說，是一個非常值得前往的酒吧。
EN:
I like this bar. They have a perfect smoke -free environment, very environmentally friendly and comfortable.The smoke -free environment is very important because it can make all customers feel comfortable without being troubled by smoke.
The atmosphere is great, it is very suitable for relaxing and enjoying time with friends.This bar has a very relaxed and warm atmosphere.The music is great, and the dart target is also very interesting.
I like their dart targets very much because it adds vitality and fun to this bar.Dart darts can make the interaction between guests smoother, and can also increase some competitive elements.The clerk's service is very good, very friendly and enthusiastic.Whether in choosing alcohol or food, they can give very objective suggestions and opinions.And it is very fast and efficient in terms of service, which surprises me.
In general, this bar is one of my favorite bars. The perfect smoke -free environment, comfortable atmosphere, interesting dart targets and excellent services are very satisfactory.I strongly recommend this bar, especially for those who like to enjoy high -quality time, it is a bar worth going to.
